## Rules.aaFilter variable

Filter matching the AA conformance rules, i.e. rules for level A and AA success criteria.

**Signature:**

```typescript
aaFilter: Predicate<Flattened.Rule>
```

## Remarks

This considers rules for the latest recommendation, i.e. WCAG 2.2
